pkgmetadata.longdescription: Store Tables in SQL Database // Provides functions for quickly writing (and reading back) a data.frame to file in 'SQLite' format. The name stands for *Store Tables using 'SQLite'*, or alternatively for *Quick Store Tables* (either way, it could be pronounced as *Quest*). For data.frames containing the supported data types it is intended to work as a drop-in replacement for the 'write_*()' and 'read_*()' functions provided by similar packages.
